articles.title: D'Antoni: Melo 'better fit' with Rockets than NYK
articles.description: Mike D'Antoni thinks Carmelo Anthony will be a "better fit" with the Rockets than he was with the Knicks, saying he won't have a problem coaching the veteran forward in Houston after their falling out six years ago in New York.
